author: Antonio Olivo, Fenit Nirappil, Gregory S. Schneider
title: Washington-area coronavirus cases soar past 4,000 on April 1 - The - The Washington Post
description: Washington-area coronavirus cases soar past 4,000 on April 1 - The The Washington Post Coronavirus update: ‘We’re behind the 8-ball,’ Hogan says; DC stay-home order now in effect WTOP Police in DC region blare PSAs, shut down basketball games, and arrest viol…
content:
The tally of cases in the District, Maryland and Virginia climbed to 4,062, according to a Washington Post analysis. The total number of fatalities reported through 8:40 p.m. Wednesday was 82.
With the region eerily quiet in most places as residents abided b… [+8804 chars]
